text: Charles Camilleri (April 3, 1923 – December 23, 2011), was a Canadian football player who played for the Toronto Argonauts. He won the Grey Cup with Toronto in 1946 and 1947.http://www.justsportsstats.com/footballstatsindex.php?player_id=camilchi001http://www.profootballarchives.com/1947irfutor.html He later worked for CBS Records. ==References== Category:Sportspeople from Toronto Category:Toronto Argonauts players Category:Grey Cup champions Category:Players of Canadian football from Ontario Category:Canadian football quarterbacks Category:1923 births Category:2011 deaths
title: Chick Camilleri
